text:
Hi Guys

I am using a CTA field on a custom module, the CTA I am using is set as a no style design, I basically want to just output it as a text link, then use CSS to style it up myself to look like a button so that my marketers don’t have to worry about styling up a CTA properly. I have done this multiple times before and it has worked well but this time, my no style CTA is being output as an image instead of plain text and I can’t figure out why. Has HubSpot changed something? Does anyone have any idea?

Many thanks!!
hi is there any capabilities to have global variables in HubSpot and then be accessed from custom module,?

Hello, would anyone be kind enough to help me with a problem I'm facing? So, I'm building a module with a logo field. What I need is to disable the size controls without enabling the prevent edit option because I still need to let people change the image. I know you can do so with a regular image field but I can't seem to find a way for this type of field ( it's a requirement that I use the logo field ). I did check the hubl supported tags section from the docs but there isn't anything I could find to be of help.
